summary: Completed comprehensive testing of iteration 2 new features: multi-source discovery, paper comparison, workspaces, annotations, export, and trends analysis. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% pass rate. Frontend core functionality working with minor session management issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Session expires quickly during extended testing, requiring frequent re-login

passed_tests: Backend: User login with test@arxiv.com / test123456
Backend: Multi-source search (arXiv + Semantic Scholar + OpenAlex)
Backend: Trends analysis API returns 10-year publication data
Backend: Paper comparison with AI analysis using Emergent LLM
Backend: Paper annotation with notes and tags
Backend: Export papers in BibTeX and Markdown formats
Backend: arXiv search returning 3 papers for 'attention' query
Frontend: Login flow and navigation to /discover
Frontend: Multi-source search returns 159,626 results from 3 sources
Frontend: Navigation links present (Discover, arXiv, Latest, Library, Projects, For You, Profile)
Frontend: Search results display with proper source labels (arXiv, S2, OA)
Frontend: Compare toggle buttons visible on each paper
Frontend: arXiv Explorer page loads with search functionality
Frontend: Latest Papers page loads with 33 category filter tabs

low_priority: Consider implementing persistent session tokens or longer session timeouts to improve user experience during extended usage
